subtitle: A classic sandwich that stands for bacon. lettuce and tomato. Serve with really fresh  bread to make this an enjoyable treat.

method.text: Grill bacon until really crisp. Cool on kitchen paper. Cut rasher in half.
Spread low fat spread on one side of each slice of bread. Repeat for the mayonnaise.
Arrange the bacon on a slice of bread. Top with the sliced tomato and lettuce leaves. Put the other slice of bread on top. Press down gently and cut sandwich into two triangles.

title: BLT
